l: Instructions for Creating a Branch or Tag Ruleset on GitHub
p: Follow these steps to create a branch or tag ruleset in your GitHub repository:
Go to your GitHub repository.
Click on the Settings tab at the top of the repository page.
Scroll down to the Code and automation section.
Click on Rulesets to manage branch and tag rulesets.
Click the New ruleset button.
In the dialog window:
Enter a name for the ruleset in the Name field.
Choose whether the ruleset applies to Branches or Tags.
Click the Create or Save ruleset button to finalize your settings.
